abstract: Robert Koren (born 20 September 1980 in Radlje ob Dravi) is a Slovenian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Premier League side Hull City. Koren earned 61 caps and scored 5 goals for the Slovenia national football team between 2003 and 2012 and played at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
